/usr/bin/c++    -g -O3 -std=c++11     CMakeFiles/kfusion-main-cuda.dir/src/mainQt.cpp.o CMakeFiles/kfusion-main-cuda.dir/src/PowerMonitor.cpp.o CMakeFiles/kfusion-main-cuda.dir/src/reader.cpp.o  -o kfusion-main-cuda -rdynamic libkfusion-cuda.a -lglut -lXmu -lXi -lGLU -lGL -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext -lrt -lstdc++ -lpthread -lGL /usr/local/cuda-7.0/lib64/libcudart.so -lrt -lstdc++ -lpthread -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/cuda-7.0/lib64
